footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All Rights Reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, offering you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred plant, its benefits, and how our ceremonies work.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find all the details here.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected and be part of our healing community.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, it has been used in sacred rituals for healing and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness, allowing for deep introspection. Participants often experience visions and emotional releases that help resolve internal conflicts, heal past traumas, and gain a clearer understanding of their life's purpose.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. Each ceremony is a unique dialogue with one's own inner self, facilitated by the spirit of the plant, which reveals what needs to be seen and healed.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to clear the mind, dissolve limiting thought patterns, and provides a clearer perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of repressed emotions and traumas, allowing for deep emotional and psychological healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Many people report a deep sense of connection with themselves, others, nature, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participating in a group creates a field of collective energy that supports and enhances individual processes. Shared experiences foster a sense_ of community and understanding.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies. These sessions are tailored to the individual's specific needs and intentions.
guidesPageSubtitle: Spiritual mentors dedicated to your healing path. With years of experience and a deep respect for ancestral traditions, our guides are here to support you with wisdom, compassion, and a safe space for your transformation.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin a special diet and mental preparation.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A safe space where the guide and the medicine accompany you for 8-10 hours.
experienceProcessDescription: A journey of introspection, release, and deep connection.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you apply the lessons learned into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: The preparation diet is crucial to purify the body and open the spirit. It is recommended to start it at least one week before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: White meats (chicken, fish) cooked simply (grilled, boiled).
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental and emotional state is as important as your physical preparation. Cultivate a calm and open mind.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca is a powerful tool for emotional healing. It's a journey that can take you to explore deep parts of your being. The experience can be intense, but it is always guided by a healing and loving purpose. It's an opportunity to confront and release old wounds, patterns, and fears that no longer serve you, opening the door to a more authentic and fulfilling life.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound experience.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony. Changes will be saved to the database.
addCeremonyDescription: Create a new ceremony. It will be added to the upcoming events.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: It is now visible in the past events section.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
mediareqdesc: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the guide. This action cannot be undone.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, book ceremonies, and fill out your confidential questionnaire.
tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour to get you started. First, could you provide your phone number? This will help us stay in touch about your ceremony preparations.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We'll use this for important updates.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and videos from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: This is where you'll find our upcoming events. You can view details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Great! The last step is to fill out a brief health questionnaire. This is confidential and essential for your safety.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, seeker. I am here to guide you. How may I assist you on your spiritual path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's color scheme (use HSL values).
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by our team to ensure a safe experience.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs) or other psychoactive drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications and dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or used other psychedelics before?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve, heal, or understand...
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your path of preparation begins now. We invite you to review our preparation guide to get the most out of your experience.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: Manage user roles, status, and view their information.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete your health questionnaire for the 'El Arte de Sanar' ceremony. It's an important step for your preparation. You can fill it out here:
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the information provided by the user.
editHeroVideoDescription: Upload a new video or change the URL for the main hero section.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file to upload or provide a video URL.
